reviews.review: Le pongo cero porque si, ni siquiera lo vi ya ya se que es mala ;v

This is easily the greatest movie of all time. The characters are T.J Miller, Wild Styl- I mean jailbreak, and Jimmy Corden. Jailbreak is a great character. They even made her say "You know women are doing things men are taking credit for" Great Message for kids! The main plot is that Gene is trying to express himself more with other emoji's. I don't know what happened next, I was dying of laughter for 3 straight hours from all the poop jokes.

In a world of increasingly cynical and company-made films, as well as an increasingly mindless audience, it was so refreshing to finally have an animated arthouse film, something rare in today's current cinematic climate. You cannot understate the Emoji Movie's accomplishments and daring, not to mention that superb animation. There's really no point of me trying to explain why the movie works so well, it's like the poster's tagline: An adventure beyond words. Anyone who doesn't like it should go and watch their hipster-trash garbage like the horrendous Edgar Wright movies, or the Lord of the Rings. Degenerates
Cringeworthy plot, boring animation and many other flaws stack up to make this movie one of the worst movies I've ever seen. Ugghhhh!
what i think about this movie is simply meh

Horrible, the jokes were either horrible, awkward or cringeworthy, the plot is cliche, the characters were either boring, discount knockoff's of other charcters from better movies, or the loud obnoxious Hi-5, and the movie is filled to the brim with cheap advertising references!
Seriously Sony! After your good movies like Cloudy with a chance of meatballs 1-2, The Smurfs 1-3, including hotel Transylvania 1-3. Please Go back making good movies. ðŸ˜’ðŸ˜”

This movie is LITERALLY ABOUT EMOJIS!! This movie is so boring, and the movie is so unoriginal, it's basically a combination of Wreck it Ralph and the Lego movie. Great on their own but together they do not mix. If I could give it 0 stars, I WOULD WITH NO REGRETS!!!
